name: Slow-Cooker Sweet and Savory Brisket of Beef
keywords: slow-cooker sweet and savory brisket of beef
description: Dried fruit adds a hint of sweetness to a hearty beef brisket prepared in the slow cooker.
recipeIngredient: 3  1/2- to 4-pound fresh beef brisket (not corned beef), trimmed of fat
1  carton (32 ounces) Progresso™ beef flavored broth
5  to 6 tablespoons Gold Medal™ Wondra® quick-mixing flour

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients except flour in 3 1/2- to 4-quart slow cooker, cutting beef to fit if necessary.
Cover and cook on Low heat setting 9 to 10 hours.

Remove beef to warm platter; cover with aluminum foil. Increase heat setting to High. Beat flour into hot cooking liquid, using wire whisk. Cover and cook 5 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until mixture is thickened. Cut beef into 8 portions; serve with sauce.
